statements: DELETE FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_id = 100 AND part_quantity > 5
DELETE FROM spacecraft_parts WHERE part_id = 101 AND location = 'Bay Area';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM components WHERE location = 'Main Storage' AND part_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'regular maintenance';
DELETE FROM spacecraft_components WHERE location = 'hangar' AND condition = 'good';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM replacement_parts WHERE replacement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
